meanings.sent1: The fuzeless bomb failed to explode.
meanings.sent2: The soldier carried a fuzeless grenade.
meanings.sent3: The fuzeless firework just fizzled out.
meanings.sent4: His plan was as fuzeless as a dud firecracker.
meanings.sent5: The fuzeless missile fell harmlessly to the ground.

meanings.sent3: The fuzeless alarm clock never rang.
meanings.sent4: Her idea was as fuzeless as a broken clock.
meanings.sent5: The fuzeless rocket veered off course.
